cards.title: Caltron
cards.subtitle: Paused
content: FOSS Linux calendar with Google Calendar integration, theme supports, and any other features I think of and implement

cards.title: SmrtGrdyn
cards.subtitle: Complete
content: Web application to allow for automatic watering, AI animal detection, and health data collection in small outdoor gardens using a raspberry pi connected to various interfaces
Data accessed remotely through user's account on SmrtGrdyn web dashboard containing interactive graphs and notifications of recent garden activity
Technologies: Java, Python, SQL, HTML, CSS, Javascript

cards.title: Azure Weather Database
cards.subtitle: Complete
content: Utilizes Microsoft Azure to build a commercially viable host for storage, retrival, and cleaning of weather data from CIMIS weather stations through a REST API
Azure functions read and fulfill requests from data queues to retrieve or clean data
Automated tasks update database by placing requests for CIMIS weather data on data queues
Technologies: Python, MSSQL, RestAPI, Microsoft Azure, Azure Core Tools, Azure Service Bus, Azure Data Queue, Azure Database Hosting

cards.title: Reddit Frontpage Stats
cards.subtitle: Complete
content: Uses the PRAW API to interact with Reddit and retrieve post information from the front page and store data in an MSSQL database
Currently gathering data to discover metrics that lead to posts becoming popular such as time of day posted
Technologies: Python, MSSQL, Alembic, PRAW, Pydantic, SQLAlchemy

cards.title: MIPS Memory Hierarchy Simulation
cards.subtitle: Complete
content: Emulates reading of MIPS binary instructions from a text file
Performs load word and store word instructions into an L1 cache and main memory module using two-way set-associative cache with least recently used write back policy
